H0.text: All matter in the Universe was said to be created by the ‘Big….what’ nearly 14 billion years ago. Boom

H1.text: All matter in the Universe was said to be created by the ‘Big….what’ nearly 14 billion years ago. Burst

H2.text: All matter in the Universe was said to be created by the ‘Big….what’ nearly 14 billion years ago. Flash

H3.text: All matter in the Universe was said to be created by the ‘Big….what’ nearly 14 billion years ago. BANG

A4.text: Detailed measurements of the expansion rate of the universe place the initial singularity at an estimated 13.787±0.02 billion years ago, which is considered the age of the universe.

A5.text: The Big Bang is a physical theory that describes how the universe expanded from an initial state of high density and temperature.
